hymn.title: I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever

layout.singingstanza: I will sing of the mer -- cies of the Lord for -- ev -- er, I will sing, I will sing; What a mer -- cy that I am in the church for -- ev -- er; I will sing of the mer -- cies of the Lord. With my mouth will I make known Thy faith -- ful -- ness, Thy faith -- ful -- ness, With my mouth will I make known Thy faith -- ful -- ness to all gen -- er -- a -- tions.

lyrics.stanza: With my mouth will I make known Thy faithfulness, Thy faithfulness, With my mouth will I make known Thy faithfulness to all generations.
